titleStmt.title: A letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel, pensioner to the great and mighty lords, the states of Holland Westfriesland writ in French on the ninth of April, N. Stile, 1688, to the Marquiss of Albeville, Envoy Extraordinary of His Majesty of Great Britain, to the high and mighty the States General of the United Provinces : to which is prefixt an account in Dutch of the letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel on the 4th of November in the year 1687, to Mr. Stewart, written by the said pensioner, and published by his order / translated out of the French and Dutch into English.
titleStmt.author: Fagel, Gaspar, 1634-1688.

notesStmt.note: The "account in Dutch" is in English.
The Marquis d'Albeville is Ignatius White--Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
